title: POC Kortal Race MIPS mountain bike helmet goes high-tech, adds huge Devour sunglasses
content:
Once a helmet is strong enough to pass certification, you might be satisfied thinking it’s as safe as it needs to be, but POC’s new Kortal Race MIPS could easily convince you otherwise. In addition to exceeding normal MTB safety standards, the Kortal Race MIPS carries several more high-tech features that could be very helpful […]
